body.name: MARBERO 12V 6Ah LiFePO4 Battery, 12 Volt Lithium Ion Replacement Battery, 5000+ Deep Cycle Power Wheels Phosphate Rechargeable Battery for Ride on Toy Car, Alarm, Boombox, Power Wheels, Fish Finder
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 49 mins
features: 🔋【Capacity Expansion】Our 12V 6Ah lithium batteries can be connected in parallel and in series to increase capacity and voltage. The maximum number of identical batteries that can be connected in series is four, providing up to 48V. In parallel, up to four identical batteries can be connected, providing up to 48AH. Batteries can also be connected in parallel and series simultaneously, for up to 48V and 48AH. Only batteries with identical voltage and capacity purchased can be used in parallel or series.

🧰【Lithium Iron Battery】LiFePO4 12 volt batteries last 8 to 10 times longer than regular lead-acid batteries (1500 to 5000 cycles versus 200 to 500 cycles). In addition, their usable capacity is twice that of lead-acid batteries, while their weight is 40% less due to their significantly higher energy density. With no memory effect, the lithium battery can hold a charge better when not in use and will not lose capacity due to a previous discharge state.

🛴【Fire Alarm Batteries】Our MARBERO 12V alarm battery pack is perfect for your fire alarm battery systems, ensuring an early first alert in case of emergencies. With its 12 volts and 6Ah capacity, this battery delivers optimal performance. Widely used in most areas such as Emergency Light, Deer Game Feeders, Exit Sign, Electronics, Fire & Security Systems, Lantern, Kids Ride Car, Power wheels, Home Alarm and more.

♻【Safety & ECO-Friendly】 The stable Lithium Iron built-in BMS (Battery Management System) protects the battery from overcharge, over-discharge, over-current, and short circuits with excellent self-discharge rate. Li-Ion batteries can be safer than lead Acid batteries, which have no protection against ground faults.

🔌【12V 6Ah Rechargeable Battery】The 12v lithium battery allows to be mounted in any position, resists shock and vibration, long lasting high performance in high and low temperatures (-15°~50°), ideal choice for our MARBERO solar panel.

【2-year Warranty】MARBERO offers you a 2-year quality guarantee from the date of purchase. During this period, you will be able to consult any question about the battery, our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours and will help you to solve your problem. If the problem can't be solved, we will try our best to help you return the battery or send you a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely used cells...but who cares?!
reviews.reviewText: No doubt these are not brand-new cells. The booklet says a 1500 cycle expected lifetime, which if new, would be closer to 5000. However, for ham radio projects and my kids power-wheels, I don't need to spend 5x as much for a BioEnno equivalent.These will still provide a longer lifespan than a brand-new Lead Acid equivalent, while weighing 1/4th as much.These are a no-brainer for 99% of projects. Plus, you're essentially recycling, so it's 'greener'.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but expensive
reviews.reviewText: I have several LiFePO4 batteries and I really like them for their high capacity to size and weight ratio as compared with lead-acid batteries having a similar capacity. LiFePO4 batteries have several other advantages, notably a longer service life, both in years and discharge/recharge cycles. Comparing this battery to another one I have that is physically the same size and has the same capacity rating (amp-hours), this battery has nearly identical specifications. However, this battery claims a 5000+ lifecycle whereas the other battery only has a 3000+ charge/discharge cycle rating. If they were the same (or similar) price, that would make this battery the obvious choice. However, this battery sells for $39.99 but the other one, which is also available on Amazon, is only $18.90. That makes this battery about 2.1x as expensive for 1.7x times as many charge/discharge cycles. So, when I do the math, unless I was building a system that would use a battery that was difficult to replace, I think I’d look for another, more cost-effective battery. That said, when I tested this battery, it performed without issue, so the only reason I’m giving this product less than a 5-star rating is because I think there are other batteries that offer better value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this battery in a power wheels upgrade to 12v. I charge it overnight and it lasts for hours of on and off use by my kids. I’ll be buying another one if I need to do more upgrades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The battery arrived in good condition & works perfectly!! Doesn’t take too long to charge & holds a charge for awhile. I’m very happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars solves a problem
reviews.reviewText: I am new to setting up a solar power system I knew I needed some batteries to store energy and power up devices. I have seen the name lifePO4 in reading about solar and saw this so ordered it. I found it to be as listed as it solves my storage problem.Star Rating System (What do my star ratings mean?):1 STAR - Completely unusable, would request a refund2 STAR - Meets minimum viable product requirements, wouldn't purchase it again3 STAR - It does what it should, but in a non-spectacular way, I may recommend it, but definitely with reservations4 STAR - I like it. It is solid quality and delivers as advertised, I would purchase it again and recommend it to a friend5 STAR - I love it. It meets or exceeds all of my expectations and is high quality, I would purchase it again and would openly promote it to friendsAs an Amazon Vine Member, I give honest reviews, whether or not it is a good one or a bad one. I'm a person who immediately checks reviews on everything, and I understand how important an honest and thoughtful review is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this as a 12volt car socket power bank. I hooked up a 12v car socket to tabs that slip right on the battery terminals. I made a box for protection and it functions perfectly for me.I've had no issues with use or charging.I love the size and weight of this battery. Works for me.To buy this and the 12v socket costs far less than any equivalent unit I've ever found.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My garage door opener likes it
reviews.reviewText: I've had a big lead acid battery jammed into my fancy garage door opener since the battery died a while back. This one is half the size and a higher capacity than the one that was in there. All I could think to do was unplug it and run the garage door opener up and down a bunch. Ran quite a few times until I got tired of messing with it and charged back up with no issues. Being the LiFePO type, I shouldn't have to replace it for a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High capacity and light weight; Replacement for Lead Acid batteries
reviews.reviewText: I got this 12 volt lithium iron phosphate (LiFePO4) battery to use as part of our solar powered security camera monitoring an area of our yard that we can not easily get power to. I really like these lithium iron batteries. They are much lighter and handle deep cycles well. The battery size is 3 1/2 inches x 4 inches x 2 3/4 inches and has F2 terminals. These LiFePO4 batteries are much lighter than the lead acid batteries and are rated at 8Ah (my old ones are 7Ah each).When the battery arrived its voltage was at 13.3 volt (as expected). I hooked this battery up to a 12 volt charge controller connected to a 50 watt solar panel to top it off before installing this in my UPS. It took about a few hours to finish charging to 13.5 volts (~100% capacity).Overall I am happy with this 12V 6Ah LiFePO4 battery and would recommend it to others. It meets my expectations so I am giving this 4 stars. Also, I am not going back to lead acid batteries!
